Structure# DisplayRepresentation.Image

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
struct Image
```

[`struct DisplayStyle`](/documentation/appintents/displayrepresentation/image-swift.struct/displaystyle)The style with which to display the image for this `DisplayRepresentation`.### [Initializers](/documentation/appintents/displayrepresentation/image-swift.struct#Initializers)
